code: import{ADD_TODO,REMOVE_TODO,TOGGLE_TODO}from"../actions/todos";export default function todos(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;if(action.type===ADD_TODO){return state.concat([action.todo]);}else if(action.type===REMOVE_TODO){return state.filter(function(todo){return todo.id!==action.id;});}else if(action.type===TOGGLE_TODO){return state.map(function(todo){return todo.id!==action.id?todo:Object.assign({},todo,{complete:!todo.complete});});}else{return state;}}
